components.component:
org.richfaces.DialogWindowButton javax.faces.command Dialog Window org.richfaces.component.UIDialogWindowButton org.richfaces.component.html.DialogWindowButton
org.richfaces.DialogWindowButton dialog-window-button.xhtml
dialogWindowButton org.richfaces.taglib.DialogWindowButtonTag org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.UIComponentTagBase
org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.AjaxComponentHandler
value java.lang.Object Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.
closeWindowAction javax.faces.el.MethodBinding Close window action
closeWindowActionListener javax.faces.el.MethodBinding Close window action listener javax.faces.event.ActionEvent.class
dir java.lang.String Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are "LTR" (left-to-right) and "RTL" (right-to-left).
lang java.lang.String Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.
title java.lang.String Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component.
style java.lang.String CSS style(s) to be applied when this component is rendered.
styleClass java.lang.String Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) to be applied when this element is rendered. This value must be passed through as the "class" attribute on generated markup.
onblur java.lang.String Javascript code executed when this element loses focus.
ondblclick java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is double clicked over this element.
onfocus java.lang.String Javascript code executed when this element receives focus.
onmousedown java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is pressed down over this element.
onmouseup java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is released over this element.
onmouseover java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is moved onto this element.
onmousemove java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is moved within this element.
onmouseout java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is moved away from this element.
onkeypress java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a key is pressed and released over this element.
onkeydown java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a key is pressed down over this element.
onkeyup java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a key is released over this element.
accesskey java.lang.String Access key that, when pressed, transfers focus to this element.
tabindex java.lang.String Position of this element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be an integer between 0 and 32767.
width java.lang.String Width of created dialog window.
height java.lang.String Height of created dialog window.
posx java.lang.String Horizontal position of created dialog window. Can be absolute integer, or relative (integer plus '%') or one of "left", "center", "right". Defaults to "center"
posy java.lang.String Vertical position of created dialog window. Can be absolute integer, or relative (integer plus '%') or one of "bottom", "middle", "top",. Defaults to "middle"
align java.lang.String Horizontal alignment of created dialog window. One of "left", "center", "right", defaults to "center"
valign java.lang.String Vertical alignment of created dialog window. One of "bottom", "middle", "top", defaults to "middle"
resizable boolean Possibility for a customer to change dialog window size by dragging from within +/- 2px zone of any border. The value is a Boolean (true/false). Default value is 'true'. true
float boolean Possibility for a customer to change dialog window position by dragging from within 16px zone of the top border. The value is a Boolean (true/false). Default value is 'true'. true
headerHeight java.lang.String The height of zone near the top border of dialog window, by dragging from which customer can change dialog window position if float=true. When float=false, this attribute is ignored. The value is a number of pixels. Default value is 16px. "16px"
maxWidth java.lang.String Maximum width of dialog window. Can be absolute number in pixels or relative in % of browser width. Used at initial calculation of width if 'width' attribute is not set, and at resizing. Default value is undefined.
maxHeight java.lang.String Maximum height of dialog window. Can be absolute number in pixels or relative in % of browser height. Used at initial calculation of height if 'height' attribute is not set, and at resizing. Default value is undefined.
posFunction java.lang.String Java script function name to be used for calculating position of dialog window. The function should accept parameters (windowId, referenceId, options). windowId - id of element in html document representing the dialog window, coordinates of which are to be set; referenceId - id of element in html document, relative to which dialog window is to be positioned; options - positioning parameters posx and posy that may be either used or ignored by the function. If posFunction is not set, posx and posy are treated as coordinates in browser window. Default value is undefined.
posReferenceId java.lang.String Id of a component used for calculating position of dialog window. Is taken into account only when posFunction is set. By default posReferenceId equals to id of this component.
mode java.lang.String Sets mode of requests to 'ajax' or 'server'. "ajax"
hideParentDialog boolean If set to true and the control is placed in another (parent) dialog, then the parent dialog will be hidden before new one is opened. If subdialog is closed with "close:" prefix (or no prefix), the parent dialog will be set visible again. If subdialog is closed with "closeall:" prefix, then as usual control will be returned to the main page, without activating the parent dialog. The value is a Boolean (true/false). Default value is 'false'. false
&ui_command_attributes;
&ajax_component_attributes;
